mapper.select: SELECT e.email email ,e.emp_pw empPw ,e.ename ename ,e.location location ,e.emp_no empNo ,e.dep_no depNo ,d.dname dname FROM emp e INNER JOIN dept d ON e.dep_no = d.dep_no WHERE email = #{email} AND emp_pw = #{empPw}
SELECT emp_no empNo ,email email FROM emp WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND email = #{email};
SELECT emp_no empNo , dep_no depNo , email , ename , location , join_date , total_leave , used_leave FROM emp WHERE leave_date IS NULL
SELECT emp_no empNo, join_date joinDate FROM emp WHERE emp_no = (SELECT MAX(emp_no) FROM emp)
